review: This is one great piece of Engineering! Amazing!

review: Great product. I would've loved an Internet option.
author: Charisse

review: I love it, I can receive so many shows.  It does exactly as advertised.  Now I need to find a "pigtail" so that my cable can be hooked in a the same time as the firestick.  My hookup on the back of the TV is awkward to get to.Enjoy the free games too
author: Linda S.

review: Works beautifully dumped the cable. Very satisfied.
author: elaine f cheek

review: It's great, have used it everywhere I've been--just plug it in and the download movies appear.  Highly recommend it use to everyone that travels or download move to watch on other televisions whether at home or away from home.  Great for traveling when you just want to relax and watch a favor movie.
author: John Walker

review: If you don't have a prime membership, you really shouldn't get it. There is nothing on it. And you have to purchase your apps, like Netflix, YouTube, and Hulu.
author: Elizabeth

review: Easiest thing I've ever used. Much better than Apple TV.

review: Great little gadget for spare room T V's not connected to cable
